item.title: MIUI OS2.0.105.0.VOCCNXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 15 China

New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 15 China

[Highlights]
Optimization: Frame drops and stuttering issues in Honor of Kings
[System animations]
Optimization: Stability of animations when opening and closing apps
[System]

Fix: Errors occurred in some cases
